TextView.android:text: -> Provide your name, attendance criteria and gender.\n-> Enter subjects, schedule and previous attendance if you want.\n-> Refer other sections of the page for more details.
-> Enter a subject.\n-> Keep clicking '+' button to add more subjects.\n-> You can add maximum 20 subjects.

-> Fill the subjects in the given 7 fields for a day.\n-> Fill the subjects from top to bottom. For Example, if you have 4 subjects on Mon, fill those 4 subjects in the first 4 fields and leave next 3 fields blank.\n-> Click 'Next' when you are done for a day.

-> Enter previous attendance for the subjects of the semester.\n-> Keep clicking 'More' to get more subject fields.\n-> You will get fields equal to the no of subjects you entered in the SUBJECTS page.
-> Click on 'CLICK TO MARK ATTENDANCE' to mark your attendance.\n-> You will not be able to RESET today's attendance once you close the app.
-> Click 'Extra Class' in navigation drawer.\n-> Click the subject of which you want to mark the attendance.\n-> Click 'Present' or 'Absent'.
-> Click 'Reset' in navigation drawer.\n-> Be CAREFUL, it will erase all your data.\n-> You can also erase your data manually by going to App Info in Setting of your android device.
